import React from 'react'; import "./Blog.css"; import { Container, Row, Col, Table } from "react-bootstrap"; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import DocumentMeta from "react-document-meta"; function MbbsCollegesInPhilippines() { const meta = { title: "Top MBBS Colleges in Philippines for 2020 Admission", description: "Top MBBS Colleges in Philippines for 2020 Admission for Indian Students offers the best facilities & fees comparatively lower than the private medical colleges of India.", canonical: "https://www.mbbsadmissionsinabroad.com/top-10-mbbs-colleges-in-philippines-for-2020-admission", meta: { charset: "utf-8", name: { keywords: "Top MBBS Colleges in Philippines for 2020 Admission", }, }, }; return (

Top MBBS Colleges in Philippines for 2020 Admission

  • AMA School of Medicine
  • University of Perpetual Help
  • Rizal Angeles University Foundation
  • Our Lady of Fatima University
  • Emilio Aguinaldo College of Medicine
  • Bicol Christian College of Medicine
  • Davao Medical School Foundation
  • Xavier University
  • University of the Philippines
  • Manila Saint Louis University
  • Conclusion

AMA School of Medicine

AMA School of Medicine is also known as AMASOM which was founded in 1980. It is one of the best Philippines top 10 medical colleges which is operational since 2008 when it was given permission by CHED to provide the Medical Program equivalent to the MBBS degree.

It is the medical school of AMA Education System in the Philippines which is lodged in AMA College Makati. It is situated at the heart of Makati City in the Philippines. This university is recognized by WHO and MCI. Indian students are provided with a license to practice in India after the MD graduation from the AMA School of Medicine.

Courses details

The AMA School of Medicine Philippines provides quality medical programs under the supervision of highly qualified faculty and state of the art infrastructure. This university is one of the top MBBS colleges in Philippines for Indian students that provide medical programs (MBBS/MD).

Admission procedure in AMA School of Medicine

The Admission procedure for AMA School of Medicine Philippines (AMASOM Philippines) is on the basis of a round of counseling and academic progress. The students are advised to read the mentioned points to avoid any kind of rejection.

  • The students need to fill the Application form with their appropriate details online on the university’s portal.
  • They need to submit the required documents & wait for the application review process.
  • When the eligible students receive an offer letter, they need to pay the University fees.
  • After paying the MBBS fees, the students can apply for the Visa.
  • Now, the students are all set to book a flight to the Philippines.
Facilities provided at AMA School of Medicine

MD program at AMA School of Medicine aims to produce competent medical practitioners that last for a duration of 6 years. It provides the following facilities:

  • This University has many facilities that are used for the advancement of students’ clinical and practical skills.
  • It has laboratories for Histology, Microbiology, Parasitology, and Pathology.
  • This university has an excellent system of hostel accommodation.
  • The hostel is fully-furnished and air-conditioned.
Faculty & Staff in AMA School of Medicine

AMA School of Medicine offers a good ratio of well trained and highly educated faculty members equipped with all the modern technology. It also provides sufficient numbers of non-technical staff to provide an ambiance of self-learning to the students.

Why study in Philippines for Indian students

MBBS in the Philippines for Indian Students is the best destination because of the following reasons:

Dr Vinit Kumar is a Educational Consultant for India & Abroad with more than 18 Years of Experience.
